author: coffee-cogs
install_msg: Thanks for installing :') Come make pull requests over at my GitHub! https://github.com/coffeebank/coffee-cogs
name: jsonrequest
short: Send and receive a json request from Discord
description: Send and receive a json request from Discord. Can be used to supplement other cogs, and includes domain whitelisting by server.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
